Body: I have set up a IP-PBX with a GSM gateway. This lets me call into my PBX. At this point I reach a IVR. One option lets me forward a call over VOIP by sending a destination.To automate this I decorated the destination with the gateway number and pauses. As described about.com.So I end up having to enter a number for each of my contacts like so:#gatewayNR#,,6,*pass*,#destinationNR#Anybody knows an app who let me do that for Android?
Title: Android app for decorating destination numbers

history.Text: I have set up a IP-PBX with a GSM gateway. This lets me call into my pbx. At this point I reach a IVR. One option lets me forward a call over VOIP by sending a destination.To automate this I decorated the destination with the gateway number and pauses. As described [about.com][1]So I end up having to enter a number for each of my contacts like so: #gatewayNR#,,6,*pass*,#destinationNR#Anybody knows an app who let me do that for android?  [1]: http://cellphones.about.com/od/howtoguides/ss/How-To-Automatically-Dial-Extensions-On-Android.htm
Android app for decorating destination numbers

I have set up a IP-PBX with a GSM gateway. This lets me call into my PBX. At this point I reach a IVR. One option lets me forward a call over VOIP by sending a destination.To automate this I decorated the destination with the gateway number and pauses. As described [about.com][1].So I end up having to enter a number for each of my contacts like so:    #gatewayNR#,,6,*pass*,#destinationNR#Anybody knows an app who let me do that for Android?  [1]: http://cellphones.about.com/od/howtoguides/ss/How-To-Automatically-Dial-Extensions-On-Android.htm
